An Australian consultancy delivering niche, bespoke offensive cybersecurity services.

About

Ludus Cybersecurity was born out of a desire to deliver a real impact to our client's security posture. We focus on partnerships, and always keep our client's interests at heart.

We provide no-nonsense security assessments based on the cold hard evidence that comes from the exploitation of systems. Our advice is grounded in decades of experience working in deeply technical cybersecurity roles.

Services

Capability Uplift

We work with our clients to deliver long term improvements in their cybersecurity capability by supplementing gaps in current capabilities while providing ongoing mentoring and training for permanent staff.

Penetration Testing

We measure and improve security through the simulation of advanced attacks against our clients' networks.

Application security

We help our clients improve the security of their applications through the provision of application security services, addressing development problems at their core, early in the development lifecycle.

Let's Get In Touch!

We use Google forms to take details. If you wish to discuss something sensitive, let us know and we can make alternative arrangements.
